title: Ep. 59. Lunar Interlude V: Reunion Tour - Part Two
description: Our heroes are out of time, out of options, out of places to hide. The holes in their history are starting to fill in; but are they going to like the answers they receive? We're almost caught up, now. Taako fights his fears. Merle loses faith. Magnus hears music.
author: shows@themcelroy.family (The McElroys)
